attributes.action: Invest £30 million of Developing Countries Funds To educate and Help people better use Rubbish and local Resources in combination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We thow away an emense amout of usful stuff if you know how to make use of it.

In poor countries there is acces to much stuff but little lateral knowledge as to how to make use of it.

If people could make better use of this stuf they could better there standard of living.

This sort of thing could help the Ecology too and let people develop on what they already know as opposed to simply westernising there know how which may prove less pratical to they're immidiate needs.
